item.title: EV sales soar as Trump axes $7,500 tax credit: 'People are rushing out' to buy, analyst says
item.description: Consumers are acting ahead of a fast-approaching Sept. 30 deadline to claim the tax break for electric vehicles.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Gilead Sciences, Monster Beverage, Trade Desk, MP Materials, Sweetgreen and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: How dealmaking king Goldman Sachs aims to dominate another corner of Wall Street
item.description: In a new interview with CNBC, a Goldman executive breaks down a key area of growth for the banking behemoth and more.

item.title: Bank of England chief says no rift with UK government as Revolut licence delay draws scrutiny
item.description: Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey denied that relations between the central bank and government had soured over delays to Revolut's bank license.
